TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PointHitTestResult extends System.Windows.Media.HitTestResult

summary.span: 表示将 用作命中测试参数的命中测试的结果。

span.span: Represents the results of a hit test that uses a as a hit test parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你还可以通过命中的测试的视觉对象上使用作为命中测试参数并返回结果作为。You can also perform a hit test on a visual object by using a as a hit test parameter and returning the result as a . 有关详细信息，请参阅[How to： 命中测试使用几何图形作为参数](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-hit-test-using-geometry-as-a-parameter.md)。For more information, see [How to: Hit Test Using Geometry as a Parameter](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-hit-test-using-geometry-as-a-parameter.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何检索返回值从方法。The following example shows how to retrieve the return value from the method. [!code-csharp[HitTestingOverview#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HitTestingOverview/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#100)] [!code-vb[HitTestingOverview#100](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HitTestingOverview/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#100)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何重写默认的命中测试中用户定义的视觉对象的支持。The following example shows how to override default hit test support in a user-defined visual object. 在这种情况下，新创建并返回从重写的方法。In this case, a new is created and returned from the overridden method. [!code-csharp[HitTestingOverview#107](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HitTestingOverview/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#107)] [!code-vb[HitTestingOverview#107](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HitTestingOverview/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#107)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property VisualHit As Visual
public: property System::Windows::Media::Visual ^ VisualHit { System::Windows::Media::Visual ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取从命中测试结果返回的视觉对象。

span.span: Gets the visual object that is returned from a hit test result.

value.span: 一个表示命中测试结果的 对象。

span.span: A object that represents the hit test result.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值可能无法在单个的命中测试期间表示多个视觉对象。The value could potentially represent multiple visual objects during a single hit test. 命中测试回叫方法定义在可视化树中的特定视觉对象上标识命中测试时要执行的操作。The hit test callback method defines the actions you perform when a hit test is identified on a particular visual object in the visual tree. 执行操作后，返回值，该值确定是否继续任何其他视觉对象的枚举。After you perform the actions, you return a value that determines whether to continue the enumeration of any other visual objects. 返回可见对象的顺序是枚举的按 z 顺序呈现平面上。The order of enumeration of returned visual objects is by z-order on the rendering plane. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何访问属性中命中测试结果回调函数。The following example shows how to access the property in a hit test results callback function. [!code-csharp[HitTestingOverview#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HitTestingOverview/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#102)] [!code-vb[HitTestingOverview#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HitTestingOverview/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#102)]
